The Activity Center (AC) is open from 6:00am to 9:00pm on Mondays.
The Activity Center (AC) is open from 6:00am to 9:00pm on Tuesdays.
The Activity Center (AC) is open from 6:00am to 9:00pm on Wednesdays.
The Activity Center (AC) is open from 6:00am to 9:00pm on Thursdays.
The Activity Center (AC) is open from 6:00am to 7:00pm on Fridays.
The Activity Center (AC) is open from 10:00am to 3:00pm on Saturdays.
The Activity Center (AC) is open from 1:00pm to 5:00pm on Sundays.
CSCI 3030 requires an online book called zybooks which costs $100.
